title: PSL promoting country’s positive image: Farrukh
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 27 (APP): Minister of State for Information and Broadcasting Farrukh Habib on Thursday said the Pakistan Super League (PSL) had played a crucial role in promoting the country’s positive image across the globe.
It also helped talented budding cricketers to fulfill their dreams, the minister said in a tweet.
The PSL seventh edition was getting off to a good start, he said, terming the zeal and enthusiasm of people for cricket ‘spectacular’.“No matter which team wins the tournament, the real winner will be Pakistan,” he remarked.
